description:
"We`ll remain best friends forever." The promise made between four young friends were engulfed by the flames of war. During the Hundred Years` War in the 15th century, there was only one way to save a comrade fallen by the assault of the English army: bequeathing the the legendary alchemical substance "Philosopher`s Stone" into the body to turn her into an immortal superhuman "Ulysses." The young Montmorency devoted himself to the forbidden research, when the fairy queen Astaroth appeared before him...
Source: crunchyroll
